channel.title: LatAm Prompt News Digest
channel.description: A daily digest of curated Latin American news.

item.title: LatAm Prompt News Digest - August 12, 2025
item.author: LatAm Prompt News Feed
item.description:
Migrants returning to Venezuela face debt and harsh living conditions — NBC

MARACAIBO, Venezuela — The hands of Yosbelin Pérez have made tens of thousands of the aluminum round gridles that Venezuelan families heat every day to cook arepas.

Chinese triads and Mexican cartels exploit US cuts to wildlife aid — The Financial Times

Criminals involved in trafficking endangered animals are ‘loving’ the closure of conservation programmes

The unprecedented feud between the US and Brazil — The Financial Times

Two of the world’s largest countries are at odds over the fate of one man: Trump ally Jair Bolsonaro. Can the rift be mended?
